body_html:
Hi Dan, it's in the protobuf library in third_party/protobuf. I'll try to take a look later and give you the full path
…
On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 6:45 AM, Dan Barnes ***@***.***> wrote: We are having trouble finding the right place to insert linkshared in the BUILD files for this to be successful. Is there any chance you could point us to the right place to set "linkshared = 1" to load protobuf as a shared library? Thanks for your help — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body:
Hi Dan, it's in the protobuf library in third_party/protobuf. I'll try to
take a look later and give you the full path

On Fri, Mar 17, 2017 at 6:45 AM, Dan Barnes <notifications@github.com>
wrote:

> We are having trouble finding the right place to insert linkshared in the
> BUILD files for this to be successful. Is there any chance you could point
> us to the right place to set "linkshared = 1" to load protobuf as a shared
> library?
>
> Thanks for your help
>
> —
> You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
> Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub
> <https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/issues/8403#issuecomment-287357021>,
> or mute the thread
> <https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AT_Sbb_QyEtgt52qIfU5AWYpZm2TJbnOks5rmo50gaJpZM4Mc-QB>
